sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_icon( NAME, ICON, ICON_DESC, TYPE,
STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME ) values(
#name#, #icon#, #iconDesc#, #type#,
#status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)

INSERT INTO sys_icon( NAME, ICON, ICON_DESC, TYPE,
STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME ) values( #name#, #icon#, #iconDesc#, #type#,
#status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS iconNo
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
sys_icon.ICON_NO AS iconNo,
sys_icon.ICON AS icon from sys_icon

SELECT
sys_icon.ICON_NO AS iconNo, sys_icon.NAME AS name, sys_icon.ICON AS icon, sys_icon.ICON_DESC AS iconDesc, sys_icon.TYPE AS type,
sys_icon.STATUS AS status, sys_icon.CREATED AS created, sys_icon.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, sys_icon.UPDATED AS updated, sys_icon.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from sys_icon where sys_icon.ICON_NO=#iconNo# limit 1
SELECT sys_icon.ICON AS icon FROM sys_icon WHERE sys_icon.ICON_NO = #iconNo# LIMIT 1
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE sys_icon
NAME=#name# ICON=#icon# ICON_DESC=#iconDesc# TYPE=#type#
STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ICON_NO=#iconNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
sys_icon.ICON_NO AS iconNo, sys_icon.NAME AS name, sys_icon.ICON_DESC AS iconDesc, sys_icon.TYPE AS type,
sys_icon.STATUS AS status, sys_icon.CREATED AS created, sys_icon.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, sys_icon.UPDATED AS updated, sys_icon.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM sys_icon WHERE sys_icon.STATUS = '1'
ORDER BY iconNo DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_icon WHERE sys_icon.STATUS = '1'
